mapper.select: SELECT no FROM movieWrite where title_kor = #{title_kor}
select w.*, i.imgUrl from movieWrite w join movieImg i on w.`no` = i.`writeNo` where w.delYn = 'N' and w.no = #{no}

select w.no, w.title_kor, i.imgUrl, w.openDate, w.genre1 from movieWrite w join movieImg i on w.`no` = i.writeNo where w.delYn = 'N' and (w.genre1 = #{genre} or w.genre2 = #{genre}) AND w.title_kor LIKE '%${title}%' or w.title_eng LIKE '%${title}%' AND LEFT(w.openDate, 7) = '${openDate}'
AND (w.title_kor LIKE '%${title}%' or w.title_eng LIKE '%${title}%') AND LEFT(w.openDate, 7) = '${openDate}'
limit #{count}, 20
select w.no, w.title_kor, i.imgUrl, w.openDate, w.genre1 from movieWrite w join movieImg i on w.`no` = i.writeNo where w.delYn = 'N'
SELECT sum(viewCount) FROM movieView WHERE movieNo = #{movieNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movieWrite (title_kor, title_eng, plot, movieTime, nation, openDate, producer, company, genre1, genre2) VALUES (#{title_kor}, #{title_eng}, #{plot}, #{movieTime}, #{nation}, #{openDate}, #{producer}, #{company}, #{genre1}, #{genre2})
mapper.update: UPDATE movieWrite SET delYn = 'Y' WHERE NO = #{no}
update movieImg set imgUrl = #{imgUrl} where writeNo = #{writeNo}
